name: The Karters 2: Turbo Charged - Prologue
description:
The Karters 2: Turbo Charged brings together the best features of Mario Kart and Crash Team Racing, and adds a multitude of unique and new elements for an unforgettable racing experience on Steam and Steam Deck!

What can you expect from Prologue

Prologue provides hours of gameplay and offers a glimpse into the full version, allowing you to experience the game in a concentrated form!

Split-Screen

Compete against your friends in head-to-head intense Split-Screen races!


(controller is required for local multiplayer)
*Disable X-Input in settings to support more than 4 controllers.

Single-Player Campaign

Embark on a thrilling single-player campaign featuring 20 challenges across 4 exciting difficulty levels!


Duels & Time Trial Mode

Experience Asynchronous Time-Trial races with your friends! Compete against your opponent's ghost and put your skills to the test, where it's all about pure skill and precision!


Global Leaderboards

Compete against other players' ghosts on the global ranking, showcasing your skills in worldwide competition!







We are a small indie studio of 8 from Poland with a goal to create the best racing game on the platform!
